title: NFL Honors, Super Bowl, Church Complaints, Jussie, Bow Wow, Blackface, Diddy, Comedy Roulette, Monique, Wings, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: NFL Honors, Super Bowl, Church Complaints, Jussie, Bow Wow, Blackface, Diddy, Comedy Roulette, Monique, Wings, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Uncle Steve rips it at NFL Honors.  He also lived that suite life at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.  Pastor Motown is asked by the congregation if church funds were used for the suite.  Jussie Smollett returns to the stage.  Bow Wow is arrested and his mug shot tells the story.  Blackface photos resurface that implicates the governor of Virginia.  Diddy just might be on his way to owning an NFL franchise.  Mo'Nique stops by Uncle Steve's talk show to promote her Vegas residency.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog praises the NFL and its players, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
